00227         class Attributes {
00228         public:
00231             enum Type {
00232                 Directory = 0,
00233                 ReadOnly,
00234                 Hidden,
00235                 Size,
00236                 CreationDate,
00237                 CreationTime,
00238                 ModificationDate,
00239                 ModificationTime,
00240                 AccessDate,
00241                 AccessTime,

00244 
00245         private:
00246             // Enumeration to control all BOOLEAN attribute values in one bit
00247             // vector.
00248             enum BoolAttrib {
00249                 BoolDirectory = 0,
00250                 BoolReadOnly,
00251                 BoolHidden,
00252                 BoolArchive
00253             };
00254 
00255             // Tells whether an attribute is defined.
00256             BitVector<Archive + 1> m_defined;
00257 
00258             // Stores all BOOLEAN attribute values in one bit vector.
00259             BitVector<BoolArchive + 1> m_bool_attribs;
00260 
00261             // All non-BOOLEAN attribute values.
00262             UINT32 m_size;
00263             Date m_creation_date;
00264             Time m_creation_time;
00265             Date m_modification_date;
00266             Time m_modification_time;
00267             Date m_access_date;
00268             Time m_access_time;
00269 
00270         public:
00276             BOOLEAN IsDefined(Type attribute) const {
00277                 return m_defined.GetBit(attribute);
00278             }
00279 
00282             BOOLEAN IsDirectory() const {
00283                 ASSERT_DEBUG(IsDefined(Directory));
00284                 return m_bool_attribs.GetBit(BoolDirectory);
00285             }
00286 
00289             BOOLEAN IsReadOnly() const {
00290                 ASSERT_DEBUG(IsDefined(ReadOnly));
00291                 return m_bool_attribs.GetBit(BoolReadOnly);
00292             }

00299             }

00358             void SetDirectory(BOOLEAN status = TRUE) {
00359                 m_defined.SetBit(Directory);
00360                 m_bool_attribs.SetBit(BoolDirectory, status);
00361             }

00429         struct FileState {
00431             OpenMode m_open_mode;
00433             BOOLEAN m_temporary;
00436             UINT32 m_cur_file_pos;
00441             UINT8 m_chunk_size;
00444             BOOLEAN m_send_progress_messages;
00447             FileChunkOperator *m_chunk_operator;
00449             mutable Error m_last_error;
00450 
00451             FileState() :
00452                 m_open_mode(ReadOnlyMode),

00454                 m_cur_file_pos(0),
00455                 m_chunk_size(0),
00456                 m_send_progress_messages(FALSE),
00457                 m_chunk_operator(0),
00458                 m_last_error(NoError)
